# Usage

## Configuring the client

```js
import { client } from "@cattle-grid/comments-api/client";

client.setConfig({
  baseUrl: "https://comments.bovine.social",
});
```

## Fetching comments

```js
const result = await comments({
  path: {
    path: "base64-encoded-path==",
  },
});
console.log(result.data);
```
